bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. Pathological Mechanism of all types of pathogenic evil stagnating in the body. BYHL 31: 留結 不散，謂之為瘤 , “When abiding nodes fail to dissipate, this is called ‘tumor’”.

② Alternative Names pi jie 痞結 , obstacle-illness node. Pathological Condition caused by abiding nodes. Lei gong yao dui 雷公藥對 Substance Entry ba dou 巴豆：主痰飲留結，利水穀 , “It controls phlegm rheum and abiding nodes ; and it frees the passage of water and grain (i.e. liquid and solid foo
